page.title: 17BIRCHERLEY GREEN SHOP CENTRE
page.content: In the centre of{HERTFORD}a new shopping centre was built in 1981 on the site of an old bus station.The name "{BIRCHERLEY GREEN}" derives from {BUTCHERY GREEN}because the area had once been used as a meat market.Large shops like "Waitrose" ( a supermaket ) ,"Boots" ( chemist ) and "Martins" ( newsagent )are mixed with smaller outlets around a pedestrian walkway.It is a popular development although some shops have closed because of high rents.A new bus station has been built at one end of the precinct.
